U

update(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method is the override of the update method of the Observer pattern when the controller is notified, this method is called
update(GameReport) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
This method is called when an object observed by the view notify the view it calls the show model method
update(T) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.server.Observer
This method contain the action that every observer will do after being notified, every class that implement the Observer interface will override the update method
Update - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.controller
The class update id an object returned to the controller after every execution of a command received by the players, it present the state of the game to the controller, is principally a class made of attribute and getter all the getter return an optional value to manage better null values.
Update(Integer, Boolean, Integer, Integer, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Update
The constructor update create an update object initializing all his attribute
